data.text: Ne aneno Ruoth Nyasaye kochungʼ e bath kendo mar misango, mi owachona niya,
Kata dabed ni gikunyo bur matut mi gichopo nyaka e piny joma otho,
Kata dabed ni gipondo ewi got Karmel,
Kata dabed ni wasikgi oterogi e twech,
Ruoth Nyasaye, ma en Jehova Nyasaye Maratego,
Jehova Nyasaye gero ute e polo
“Adier wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto
mondo jo-Israel okaw jo-Edom modongʼ kaka margi
Bangʼe abiro miyo joga Israel duogi.
